verses.name: Proverbs 13:13
verses.text: Whoso despiseth the word shall be destroyed: but he that feareth the commandment shall be rewarded.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:14
verses.text: The law of the wise is a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:15
verses.text: Good understanding giveth favour: but the way of transgressors is hard.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:16
verses.text: Every prudent man dealeth with knowledge: but a fool layeth open his folly.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:17
verses.text: A wicked messenger falleth into mischief: but a faithful ambassador is health.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:18
verses.text: Poverty and shame shall be to him that refuseth instruction: but he that regardeth reproof shall be honoured.
